channel.title: packagekit on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in packagekit on Paul Cutler

item.title: Foresight updates
item.description: My blog has been quiet lately (darn work making me travel!). Let’s see what’s been going on in the world of Foresight: Work on the updated Userguide continues. A Foresight-Docs mailing list was created on Google Groups. Japanese translation is almost complete! The marketing team has kicked off a discussion about the new Foresight website. What sites do you like? What do you not like? Add your thoughts, and join the discussion.
